(numLdqEntries, power_switching).explanation: Increasing the number of load queue entries requires more switching transistors and logic gates, directly increasing switching power consumption;

(numLdqEntries, time).explanation: More load queue entries increase the complexity of scheduling and selection logic, potentially increasing critical path delays and execution time;

(numLdqEntries, cpi).explanation: Additional load queue entries can reduce memory-related stalls by allowing more outstanding loads, thereby decreasing cycles per instruction;
